properties.description: The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required, string) Name of the server to create (must be unique per project and a valid hostname as per RFC 1123).

properties.name: server_type
properties.description: (Required, string) Name of the server type this server should be created with.

properties.name: image
properties.description: (Required, string) Name or ID of the image the server is created from.

properties.name: location
properties.description: (Optional, string) The location name to create the server in. nbg1, fsn1 or hel1

properties.name: datacenter
properties.description: (Optional, string) The datacenter name to create the server in.

properties.name: user_data
properties.description: (Optional, string) Cloud-Init user data to use during server creation

properties.name: ssh_keys
properties.description: (Optional, list) SSH key IDs or names which should be injected into the server at creation time

properties.name: keep_disk
properties.description: (Optional, bool) If true, do not upgrade the disk. This allows downgrading the server type later.

properties.name: iso
properties.description: (Optional, string) ID or Name of an ISO image to mount.

properties.name: rescue
properties.description: (Optional, string) Enable and boot in to the specified rescue system. This enables simple installation of custom operating systems. linux64 linux32 or freebsd64

properties.name: labels
properties.description: (Optional, map) User-defined labels (key-value pairs) should be created with.

properties.name: backups
properties.description: (Optional, boolean) Enable or disable backups.

properties.name: network_id
properties.description: (Required, int) ID of the network which should be added to the server.

properties.name: server_id
properties.description: (Required, int) ID of the server.

properties.name: ip
properties.description: (Optional, string) IP to request to be assigned to this server. If you do not provide this then you will be auto assigned an IP address.

properties.name: alias_ips
properties.description: (Required, list[string]) Additional IPs to be assigned to this server.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required, string) Name of the volume to create (must be unique per project).

properties.name: size
properties.description: (Required, int) Size of the volume (in GB).

properties.name: server
properties.description: (Optional, int) Server to attach the Volume to, optional if location argument is passed.

properties.name: location
properties.description: (Optional, string) Location of the volume to create, optional if server_id argument is passed.

properties.name: automount
properties.description: (Optional, bool) Automount the volume upon attaching it (server_id must be provided).

properties.name: format
properties.description: (Optional, string) Format volume after creation. xfs or ext4
Note: When you want to attach multiple volumes to a server, please use the hcloud_volume_attachment resource and the location argument instead of the server_id argument.

properties.name: volume_id
properties.description: (Required, int) ID of the Volume.

properties.name: server_id
properties.description: (Required, int) Server to attach the Volume to.

properties.name: automount
properties.description: (Optional, bool) Automount the volume upon attaching it.

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required, string) Name of the Network to create (must be unique per project).

properties.name: ip_range
properties.description: (Required, string) IP Range of the whole Network which must span all included subnets and route destinations. Must be one of the private ipv4 ranges of RFC1918.

properties.name: labels
properties.description: (Optional, map) User-defined labels (key-value pairs) should be created with.

properties.name: network_id
properties.description: (Required, int) ID of the Network the route should be added to.

properties.name: destination
properties.description: (Required, string) Destination network or host of this route. Must be a subnet of the ip_range of the Network. Must not overlap with an existing ip_range in any subnets or with any destinations in other routes or with the first ip of the networks ip_range or with 172.31.1.1.

properties.name: gateway
properties.description: (Required, string) Gateway for the route. Cannot be the first ip of the networks ip_range and also cannot be 172.31.1.1 as this IP is being used as a gateway for the public network interface of servers.

properties.name: network_id
properties.description: (Required, int) ID of the Network the subnet should be added to.

properties.name: type
properties.description: (Required, string) Type of subnet. server

properties.name: ip_range
properties.description: (Required, string) Range to allocate IPs from. Must be a subnet of the ip_range of the Network and must not overlap with any other subnets or with any destinations in routes.

properties.name: network_zone
properties.description: (Required, string) Name of network zone.
The following arguments are supported:

properties.name: name
properties.description: (Required, string) Name of the SSH key.

properties.name: public_key
properties.description: (Required, string) The public key. If this is a file, it can be read using the file interpolation function

properties.name: type
properties.description: (Required, string) Type of the Floating IP. ipv4 ipv6

properties.name: server_id
properties.description: (Optional, int) Server to assign the Floating IP to.

properties.name: home_location
properties.description: (Optional, string) Home location (routing is optimized for that location). Optional if server_id argument is passed.

properties.name: description
properties.description: (Optional, string) Description of the Floating IP.

properties.name: labels
properties.description: (Optional, map) User-defined labels (key-value pairs) should be created with.

properties.name: floating_ip_id
properties.description: (Required, int) ID of the Floating IP.

properties.name: server_id
properties.description: (Required, int) Server to assign the Floating IP to.

properties.name: dns_ptr
properties.description: (Required, string) The DNS address the ip_address should resolve to.

properties.name: ip_address
properties.description: (Required, string) The IP address that should point to dns_ptr.

properties.name: server_id
properties.description: (Required, int) The server the ip_address belongs to.

properties.name: floating_ip_id
properties.description: (Required, int) The Floating IP the ip_address belongs to.
